dialogues.text: Ah, a brave soul! I need rare herbs for a potion. Can you retrieve them?
dialogues.info: Gather rare herbs for the Wizard. Reward: +{number2} HP.

option1.response: The Wizard nods. 'Excellent! They grow deep in the forest.'

option2.response: The Wizard frowns. 'Time waits for no one, adventurer.'

option3.response: The Wizard explains, 'This potion can heal even the gravest wounds.'

dialogues.text: I’ve crafted this scroll. Care to trade {number1} gold for it?
dialogues.info: Buy a scroll that grants +{number2} damage.

option1.response: You hand over the gold. 'Use it wisely,' says the Wizard.

option2.response: The Wizard smirks. 'Knowledge is never cheap.'

option3.response: The Wizard sighs. 'A pity. Perhaps another time.'

dialogues.text: Beware! A cursed tome has appeared. Destroy it before it corrupts anyone else.
dialogues.info: Destroy the cursed tome. Reward: +{number2} gold.

option1.response: The Wizard looks relieved. 'Thank you, brave one!'

option2.response: The Wizard warns, 'You risk the curse spreading.'

option3.response: The Wizard explains, 'It spreads madness to anyone nearby.'

dialogues.text: You’ve come far! Let me enchant your weapon—for a price, of course.
dialogues.info: Pay {number1} gold to enchant your weapon (+{number2} damage).

option1.response: The Wizard casts a spell. 'Now it gleams with power!'

option2.response: The Wizard chuckles. 'Power isn’t cheap.'

option3.response: The Wizard explains, 'It will strike with unmatched force!'

dialogues.text: A dragon stirs in the east. Shall I scry its location for you?
dialogues.info: Accept the Wizard's vision. Reward: {number2} gold.

option1.response: The Wizard chants. 'The dragon waits in the volcanic mountains.'

option2.response: The Wizard nods. 'The dragon will not rest forever.'

option3.response: The Wizard states, 'Preparation is the key to victory.'

dialogues.text: I found this strange trinket. Care to buy it for {number1} gold?
dialogues.info: Pay {number1} gold for a trinket that grants + {number2} HP.

option1.response: You pay the Villager, who hands you the trinket.

option2.response: The Villager shrugs. 'Suit yourself.'

option3.response: The Villager says, 'I hear it protects against harm.'

dialogues.text: I’ve heard rumors of treasure in the old ruins. Care to trade {number1} gold for a map?
dialogues.info: Buy a treasure map for {number1} gold. The map could lead to untold riches.

option1.response: You hand over the gold, and the Villager gives you the map. 'Good luck!'

option2.response: The Villager looks disappointed. 'Your loss, friend.'

option3.response: The Villager whispers, 'They say the ruins are cursed but full of gold.'

dialogues.text: I have an amulet for sale. It’s said to ward off evil for {number1} gold.
dialogues.info: Pay {number1} gold for an amulet that grants + {number2} HP and protection.

option1.response: You hand over the gold, and the Villager gives you the amulet. 'Wear it well.'

option2.response: The Villager shrugs. 'Suit yourself, but don’t blame me if something happens!'

option3.response: The Villager says, 'It’s been blessed by a monk—very rare!'

dialogues.text: I saw a strange creature by the river. If you slay it, I’ll share my findings!
dialogues.info: Kill the creature by the river. Reward: Potion (+ {number2} damage).

option1.response: The Beggar nods eagerly. 'Return to me once the creature is slain!'

option2.response: The Beggar looks disappointed. 'Ah, well. It was worth asking.'

option3.response: The Beggar says, 'It’s a big, ugly thing—green scales, sharp teeth!'

dialogues.text: A thief stole my coin purse! If you catch them, I’ll share half the gold with you.
dialogues.info: Catch the thief. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The Beggar nods. 'The thief went that way! Be quick!'

option2.response: The Beggar looks crestfallen. 'I understand. Not everyone’s willing to help.'

option3.response: The Beggar says, 'A wiry fellow in a red cloak—he’s fast, but not clever.'

dialogues.text: Can you spare a coin or two? I’ll tell you a secret about this town.
dialogues.info: Pay {number1} gold for a valuable secret.

option1.response: The Beggar smiles. 'Thank you! Did you know the fountain heals all your wounds?'

option2.response: The Beggar looks hurt. 'No matter. Secrets aren’t for everyone.'

option3.response: The Beggar says, 'I lost everything. This is all I can do to survive.'

dialogues.text: My pickaxe broke! If you bring me another, I’ll share a treasure I dug up.
dialogues.info: Deliver a pickaxe to the Miner. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The Miner grins. 'You’re a lifesaver! Here’s your reward.'

option2.response: The Miner sighs. 'I guess I’ll have to wait a bit longer.'

option3.response: The Miner explains, 'I can't keep working without one. I’ve got precious finds to dig up!'

dialogues.text: I struck a vein of gold! But I need help digging it out. Can you lend a hand?
dialogues.info: Help the Miner extract gold. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The Miner beams. 'Thank you! Together we’ll strike it rich.'

option2.response: The Miner sighs. 'Ah well, I’ll manage somehow.'

option3.response: The Miner says, 'Not long at all if we work together!'

dialogues.text: This cave is dangerous. I need a guard to help me work safely.
dialogues.info: You get {number1} gold to help the Miner.

option1.response: The Miner smiles. 'Thanks! With guards, I can work without fear.'

option2.response: The Miner frowns. 'I guess I’ll have to risk it.'

option3.response: The Miner says, 'It’s filled with creatures that attack miners. It’s not safe alone.'

dialogues.text: The dragon threatens my kingdom! Slay its minions, and I’ll make you a knight!
dialogues.info: Kill 3 dragon minions. Reward: Knight title (increase HP by {number2}).

option1.response: The King smiles. 'You have my blessing, brave warrior!'

option2.response: The King nods solemnly. 'I understand, but my kingdom will be in peril.'

option3.response: The King grimaces. 'The dragon’s minions are terrorizing my people. We need a hero like you.'

dialogues.text: The treasury needs protection. Guard it for a night, and I’ll reward you generously.
dialogues.info: Guard the treasury. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The King says, 'Excellent! Report to the guards immediately.'

option2.response: The King frowns. 'A pity. The treasury must remain safe.'

option3.response: The King explains, 'Thieves have been targeting the kingdom’s gold reserves.'

dialogues.text: The council seeks your wisdom. Share your thoughts, and you’ll be rewarded.
dialogues.info: Provide strategic advice. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The King listens carefully. 'Your insights are invaluable.'

option2.response: The King sighs. 'I hoped you might lend your wisdom.'

option3.response: The King says, 'It concerns matters of trade and diplomacy.'

dialogues.text: I have gold to spare. Bring me dragon scales, and I’ll pay you handsomely.
dialogues.info: Deliver dragon scales. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The Queen nods. 'I will await your return with the scales.'

option2.response: The Queen's expression hardens. 'I see. It seems the scales are too much to ask for.'

option3.response: The Queen explains, 'Dragon scales are rare and valuable. They can be sold or crafted into powerful items.'

dialogues.text: My garden needs protection from pests. Help me, and I’ll reward you.
dialogues.info: Defend the Queen’s garden. Reward: Rare flowers (+ {number2} healing).

option1.response: The Queen smiles warmly. 'Thank you. My garden is precious to me.'

option2.response: The Queen looks disappointed. 'I understand, though my garden will suffer.'

option3.response: The Queen explains, 'They are magical creatures that feed on rare plants.'

dialogues.text: I’ve crafted a potion for the brave. For {number1} gold, it’s yours.
dialogues.info: Buy a healing potion for {number1} gold. Reward: + {number2} HP.

option1.response: The Queen hands you the potion. 'Use it wisely.'

option2.response: The Queen nods. 'Another time, perhaps.'

option3.response: The Queen says, 'It is made from the rarest ingredients in the kingdom.'

dialogues.text: Welcome, traveler! Rest here for {number1} gold and restore your health.
dialogues.info: Pay {number1} gold. Reward: {number2} HP restoration.

option1.response: The Innkeeper takes your gold and hands you a warm bed. 'Rest well, traveler.'

option2.response: The Innkeeper nods. 'If you change your mind, the bed is ready.'

option3.response: The Innkeeper smiles. 'This place has been serving travelers for years. A good place to rest your weary bones.'

dialogues.text: Bandits have been sighted nearby. Stay and help us defend the inn!
dialogues.info: Defend the inn. Reward: + {number2} gold.

option1.response: The Innkeeper smiles gratefully. 'We are in your debt!'

option2.response: The Innkeeper looks worried. 'I understand, but we’ll have to manage on our own.'

option3.response: The Innkeeper says, 'They’ve been targeting travelers and inns alike.'

dialogues.text: Would you like a meal? For {number1} gold, I’ll serve you the finest stew.
dialogues.info: Buy a meal for {number1} gold. Reward: + {number2} health points.

option1.response: The Innkeeper serves you a steaming bowl of stew. 'Enjoy your meal!'

option2.response: The Innkeeper nods. 'Come back if you change your mind.'

option3.response: The Innkeeper says, 'It’s a secret recipe passed down through generations!'

dialogues.text: My forge is cold. Bring me coal, and I’ll craft you a weapon.
dialogues.info: Deliver coal. Reward: Weapon (+ {number2} damage).

option1.response: The Blacksmith nods. 'Good, I’ll need a lot of coal to get my forge working again.'

option2.response: The Blacksmith looks disappointed. 'A cold forge is no good to anyone, but I understand.'

option3.response: The Blacksmith grunts. 'I need a large amount of coal to heat up the forge and start working. Can you gather it for me?'

dialogues.text: My hammer broke! Find me a new one, and I’ll repair your armor for free.
dialogues.info: Deliver a hammer. Reward: Free armor repair (+ {number2} health points).

option1.response: The Blacksmith nods. 'A good hammer is essential. Thank you!'

option2.response: The Blacksmith sighs. 'Without a hammer, I can’t do my job.'

option3.response: The Blacksmith says, 'It must be strong enough to handle heavy forging.'

dialogues.text: I’ve crafted a fine sword. For {number1} gold, it’s yours.
dialogues.info: Buy a sword for {number1} gold. Reward: + {number2} damage.

option1.response: The Blacksmith smiles. 'You won’t regret this purchase!'

option2.response: The Blacksmith shrugs. 'Another adventurer might need it.'

option3.response: The Blacksmith says, 'It’s balanced, sharp, and built to last.'
